document_data.name: Tegan
document_data.mainbody: '''Tegan''' was an escaped slave in the [[Deep Wastes]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/It's All in the Blood|14-15}}
document_data.History: Tegan and her brother [[Drystan]] were two farmers in the [[Dalelands]] until, ''circa'' [[1481 DR]], they were captured in an [[orc]] raid. They were sold to the [[yugoloth]] [[Maram il Vass]] as a slave in its lair in the Deep Wastes. ''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], they managed to escape but were in very poor condition until they met an adventuring party that saved Tegan.
document_data.Personality: Tegan had a desperate need for help but her time with a [[yugoloth]] caused her to not trust anyone. Tegan was proud and stubborn.
